701572f-a.title: Bronx: White Plains Road - Tremont Avenue (East)
701572f-a.text:
(view 1) White Plains Road at East Iremont Avenue, ooNing
southeastward and showing construction of the Parkchester
Houses, on the former site of the Catholic Protectory.
(view 2) White Plains Road and Westchester Avenue, Bronx,
looking southeastward and showing construction of the
Parkchester Houses.
(view 3) Castle Hill Avenue at St. Raymond Avenue, Sronx,
lOoking northwestward and showing construction of Park-
chester Houses.
(view 4) Castle Hill Avenue, opposite Glover Street, Bronx,
locking northwestward and showing construction of the
Parkchester Houses.
P. L. Sperr, photographer
September 4, 1939
701572f-a.folder: White Plains Road & Tremont Avenue (East), Bronx, NY

700927f-b.title: Bronx: White Plains Road - Tremont Avenue (East)
700927f-b.text:
View 1: East Iremont Avenue at the north-west cor.
'hite Plains Road, Bronx, showing the khite
Plains oad bridge over the New Haven Rail-
road tracks.
View 2: 'hite Plains Road and East Iremont Avenue,
nerth-east corner, showing the Unionport
RRoad bridge over the tracks. The gasoline
station occupies a triangular plot between
the two thoroughfares.
Sept. 4, 1939
P. L. Sperr, photographer
